title: Refuse to ban a champion in RANKED/DRAFT modes *SUPER RANT*
body:
Why the hell it's okay to not ban champ in ranked or draft games, what a point of playing ranked/draft games if they don't want to ban they should play normals, arams, or coops games. 

I suggest you to remove that None icon to not ban champion in ranked and draft games.

It's not okay to not ban champs in ranked/draft games. 

What a point of playing ranked or draft games if everyone don't want to ban and lose because of some champs that are insanely broken or anything for example never ban kass pre nerf becuase you shouldnt be afraid of that champion? Then He roamed everything and win. 

Remove none icon from ranked and draft mode. Keep that shit in all other modes.
